sections.name: ‚úã Hi, I'm Amarjeet Singh
sections.title: A Creative Front-End
sections.about: I am a passionate Frontend Developer with expertise in React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I love building interactive and dynamic user interfaces.

sections.name: ‚úã About me
sections.title: What i can
sections.description: I am a passionate Front-End Developer with over 2 years of experience in creating dynamic and high-performance web applications. My expertise is in building responsive and interactive user interfaces using modern technologies such as React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I excel at optimizing performance, writing clean and reusable code, and collaborating with teams to bring innovative ideas to life. Always eager to learn, I keep up with the latest trends to deliver seamless and engaging user experiences.

strengths.title: ‚úÖ Team Collaboration
strengths.description: Experience in working with cross-functional teams.

strengths.title: ‚úÖ Quick Learner
strengths.description: Adapts to new technologies and frameworks quickly.
